page.title: 05OPEN GROUND-DUNTON GREEN
page.content: A lot of our assigned block is open ground, mostly fields,farmland, park & woods.The{farms}have dairy & beef cattle & a few sheep. Some grain is grown. The{River Darent}runs through a large lake which belongs to Marley Tile who dig sand out of it to make roof tiles. It is very pleasant walking by the lake as there is a lot of{wild life}, Canada geese, sand-martins,kingfishers,to name but a few. Wild plants grow freely. The activities on the lake are the Chipstead Sailing Club and an angling club. There is also a Cheshire Home for the disabled. Both Chevening & Dunton Green have large recreation grounds with swings,slides,etc. People fly kites & take dogs for walks. D.G. has two tennis courts for hire.
